Sample_1.Transcription: HE WAS LIKE UNTO MY FATHER IN A WAY AND YET WAS NOT MY FATHER
Sample_1.Origin: he was like unto my father in a way and yet was not my father
Sample_1.Inference: he was not my father in a way and yet was not her father
